data.system_settings: PC : Windows 10 x64 / Android : Huawei Honor 10 View (BKL-L09) Android 8.0.0
data.client_settings: PC : Stable, Build Number: 23017 / Android : Android Alpha 7.4.8 (748)
data.actual_result: You can override the 100 characters limit and make it to 150 or 200
data.expected_result: You shouldn't be allowed to add another characters on Android
data.short_description: With PC + Android you can make a 200 characters server's name when the limit is at 100 /Android not counting PC's emojis
data.steps_to_repro: - Modify a server name on PC and put 100 emojis on his name like 🎄 for exemple (make it to the 100 characters limit)- Save his name - On Android modify server's name by adding 100 emojis or 50 letters- Save his name
